title: WTB: Low Grade Hal Chase Blue Portrait
author: rp12367

posts.post_title: WTB: Low Grade Hal Chase Blue Portrait
posts.post_content: Looking for a low grade fair/good Chase Blue Portait, perfer a Sovereign back, but any back will do. Beaters aka well loved are welcome. Please PM or e-mail. Thx in advance. Ralph.   [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

[quote name="deltufjp2" post=1032399]Would this work? [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/110940181749?ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1438.l2649[/url][/QUOTE]

I saw that one earlier today, going to keep it in mind. Figured I would see what was out there doesn't need to be graded raw is also fine. Hoping to come across a well loved Sovereign. Thanks for the heads up on the card...Thx Ralph
I believe there is also another one ending tonight. I sold my beater Chase a while ago. Hope this helps.
